entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow at times early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
